nodes.bodyText: oh nice , so that finally works for not propagating the events to the parent window right? :)

Yep it works fine @romartin!
I thought in a first look it could mess up with keyup and keypress events, but we have different concepts here. Stopping event propagation just prevent it to go up in the elements hierarchy, but doesn't prevent events to be commited at that level.  The preventDefault does that.
